mapper.insert: insert into participant(account_no, id, type, name) values(#{accountNo},#{id}, #{type}, #{name})
mapper.select: select account_no as accountNo, id, type, name from participant where account_no in (select account_no from gathering where safe_account_no = #{safeAccountNo}) order by type asc
select account_no as accountNo from participant where account_no = ${accountNo} and (name = ${counterpart} or name like '%'||DECODE(#{indication}, NULL, 'm1h3h5bf', #{indication})||'%')
select account_change, transfer, deposit_date from participant where id = #{id} and account_no = (select account_no from gathering where safe_account_no = #{safeAccountNo})
select tel from member where id in (select id from participant where account_no = #{accountNo} and account_change = 'Y')
select account_no as accountNo, id, name from participant where account_no in (select account_no from scheduled_end where TO_CHAR(end_date,'YY/MM/DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD'))
mapper.delete: delete from participant where account_no in (select account_no from scheduled_end where TO_CHAR(end_date,'YY/MM/DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: select tel from member where id in (select id from participant where account_no = #{accountNo} and transfer = 'Y')
